name: Planet Jackers
description:
Planet-hop your way to safety with a team of battle-hardened ex-marines. Give orders to your mercs as they shoot, loot and fight their way across the solar system.

In this game you take indirect control of 4 mercenaries trying to make it back home through some let's just say pretty hostile territory.

It's inspired by the scene on Aliens where the Marines appear on the screens and they're guided into the alien-infested facility by a remote commander.

  • Visit different planets
  • Make friends with the locals (Well, blow them to bits)
  • Make life or death decisions
  • Take questionable steroids and unsavoury upgrades
  • Battle the boss of each planet
  • There might be zombies somewhere...

Hope you enjoy the game!

- Rename your marines

- Make tough choices that can impact your progression

- Each playthrough is different

- Try to 'retreat' anyone close to death

- Death is permanent!

- Level up on missions

- Buy extra gear at the shop after each planet
